venue.name: University of New England Blewett Hall 006

item.description:
Join us for another season of $1 Permaculture Movie Nights.  Our kick-off movie for this year is YERT: The Film.  


YERT (Your Environmental Road Trip): 50 States. 1 Year. Zero Garbage? Called to action by a planet in peril, three friends hit the road - traveling with hope, humor, and all of their garbage - to explore every state in America (the good, the bad...and the weird) in search of the extraordinary innovators and citizens who are tackling humanity's greatest environmental crises. As the YERT team layers outlandish eco-challenges onto their year-long quest, an unexpected turn of events pushes them to the brink in this award-winning docu-comedy. Featuring Bill McKibben, Wes Jackson, Will Allen, Janine Benyus, Joel Salatin, David Orr, and others.  Here is the film web site for more info!

6:30 Potluck Supper (bring a dish to share and your own potluck kit!)

7:00 Announcements and Movie

8:30-8:45ish Discussion and Closing

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We are in Blewett Hall Rm 006; Building is #7 on the Campus Map http://www.une.edu/admissions/upload/wccmap.pdf

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Permaculture Movie Night - YERT: The Film
